diff_hunk:
@@ -8,6 +8,7 @@ def tf_workspace(path_prefix = "", tf_repo_name = ""):
     name = "eigen_archive",
     url = "https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/get/b4fa9622b809.tar.gz",
     sha256 = "2862840c2de9c0473a4ef20f8678949ae89ab25965352ee53329e63ba46cec62",

body: yeah, somehow separating the hash here would be great -- then we only have to replace the hash and the sha256 in one file and updating eigen becomes super easy :)
